effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   [Raises]{mechanic:raise} the target's [Speed]{mechanic:speed} by one stage.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises Speed by one stage in battle.  Raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
素早さを　あげる　道具。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

An item that boosts the Speed stat
of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears
off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta la Velocità di un Pokémon in una lotta.
L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon è sostituito.

Aumenta la Velocidad en combate. Al cambiar de
Pokémon, el efecto desaparece.

Hebt den Initiative-Wert eines Pokémon im Kampf.
Die Wirkung wird mit dem Austausch des
Pokémon beendet.

Augmente la Vitesse pendant un combat.
L’effet disparaît si le Pokémon se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 스피드를 올리는
도구. 포켓몬을 볼에 넣어버리면
원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
すばやさを　あげる　どうぐ。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

An item that raises the Speed stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

An item that raises the Speed stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if
the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte la Vitesse pendant un combat.
L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon se
retire.
